data.title: When is Amazon Prime Day? Experts predict July 11 or July 18
data.description: It's the question that marketplace sellers, analysts, vendors and everyone else in the Amazon ecosystem want answered: When will Prime Day be in 2022? Hints in Amazon's online community for 3rd-party sellers suggest it will be July 11 or July 18.

data.title: US ecommerce sales reached $1.119 trillion in 2023
data.description: U.S. ecommerce represented 22.0% of total retail sales, according to Digital Commerce 360 analysis of U.S. Department of Commerce data.

data.title: PayPal among the top payment methods accepted with retailers
data.description: PayPal is the fifth most popular payment method retailers accept as of August 2019. Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover Card round out the top 5, respectively, with the majority of online retailers in Internet Retailers 2019 Top 1000 accepting these forms of payment.

data.title: Yummly integrates Amazon cookware into its app
data.description: Yummlyâ€™s iPhone app users will see related cooking products they can buy on Amazon while they are looking at recipes.

data.title: 40% of new Pinterest users are men
data.description: Pinterest says it has 150 million active monthly users.
